text: ahashi ha mahapolove paramadhipatiyanan kavurundæ?yi numba vimasanu. allah yæyi numba pavasanu. allahgen tora va taman veta kisidu prayojanayak ho himsavak ho kirimata himikam nodarana bharakaruvan numbala gattehu dæyi numba vimasanu. andhaya ha penumætta eka samana vevida ? emenma andhakarayan ha alokaya eka samana vevi dæ?yi numba vimasanu. ese nætahot ohu mavanavak men ovunda mava ema mævima ovunata galapa ganna havulkaruvan allahta adesa vasayen ovun tabannoda? siyalu dæhi mævumkaru allah yæyi da tavada ohu ekiyaya yæyi da (siyalla) mæda pavatvanna yæyi da pavasanu
